document.docAuthor: González, Jorge M., López, Bernardo, Díaz, José De Jesús García, Simon, Sabrina, Sarto, Víctor & Worthy, Robert
document.masterDocTitle: Reinstatement of Athis miastagma (Dyar, 1925) (Lepidoptera: Castniidae) as a valid species inhabiting the Pacific slope of Central Mexico

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Reinstatement of Athis miastagma (Dyar, 1925) (Lepidoptera: Castniidae) as a valid species inhabiting the Pacific slope of Central Mexico

GUERRERO
: 1♀ ,
C. hechtiae
♀ , 477, Mexico , Guerrero , 20.31, Joicey Bequest. Brit. Mus. 1934‒120, BMNH(E) 1403377 ( NHMUK ) [there is no doubt that this specimen is
A. hechtiae
, however, we believe that the locality data is incorrect]
;
OAXACA
: 1♂ , Oaxaca , Mexico ,
1/Feb/1979
, Col.?, ( RW ) [The date for this specimen does not coincide with typical collecting dates for the species, therefore we doubt its validity.]
;
1♀ ,
2.1 mi. Totolapán
, Oaxaca , Mexico ,
7-VIII-1980
, Coll. Shaffner & Friedlander ( TAMU ) [This locality is outside the Tehuacán-Cuicatlán Valley; the specimen was possibly a vagrant]
;
VERACRUZ
: 1♂ , Presidio, Veracruz , VI-[19]42, T. Escalante ( MGCL ) [The locality of this specimen is very doubtful. The host plant of
A. hechtiae
is not present in this ecosystem, which is completely different from that of the Tehuacán-Cuicatlán Valley].
